Ash piles can be found throughout the Fossil Island Volcano, and can be mined with level 22 Mining, granting 10 experience. When mined, they can produce soda ash and volcanic ash.

Unlike other ore rocks, ash piles can be mined several times before being depleted. After being mined, ash piles take around 30 seconds to respawn.

Players cannot receive unidentified fossils from mining ash piles. However, they can still receive gems, clue geodes and the rock golem.

Contents

  • 1 Mining Info
  • 2 Yield
  • 3 Locations
  • 4 References

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Ash pile
Level required 22
Mining XP10 xp
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time30
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Volcanic ash1–6Always83–498120–720
Soda ash1Rare441

Yield[edit | edit source]

The amount of ash obtained is scaled to the player's Mining level, starting with one ash at level 22 and increasing by one for every 15 levels above 22, to a maximum of six ash at 97 (boosts can be used). Mining enhancers do not affect the yield when mining volcanic ash.[1]

Mining Level Ash Obtained
22 1
37 2
52 3
67 4
82 5
97 6

LocationRocksMembers
Fossil Island Volcano15

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 9 September 2017. (Archived from the original on 25 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "[Do Varrock armor, mining cape and mining gloves affect mining volcanic ash?] No."

'''Ash piles''' can be found throughout the [[Fossil Island Volcano]], and can be mined with level 22 [[Mining]], granting 10 experience. When mined, they can produce [[soda ash]] and [[volcanic ash]].

Unlike other ore rocks, ash piles can be mined several times before being depleted. After being mined, ash piles take around 30 seconds to [[respawn]].

Players cannot receive [[unidentified fossil]]s from mining ash piles. However, they can still receive [[gems]], [[clue geode]]s and the [[rock golem]].

==Mining Info==
{{Mining info
|name = Ash pile
|level = 22
|xp = 10

|time = 30
}}

{{DropsLineSkill|name=Soda ash|quantity=1|rarity=Rare|skill=Mining}}
{{DropsTableBottom}}
==Yield==
The amount of ash obtained is scaled to the player's [[Mining]] level, starting with one ash at level 22 and increasing by one for every 15 levels above 22, to a maximum of six ash at 97 (boosts can be used). [[Mining enhancers]] '''do not''' affect the yield when mining volcanic ash.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/906484443271061504|date=9 September 2017|archiveurl=https://archive.is/w53qH|archivedate=25 May 2020|quote=[Do Varrock armor, mining cape and mining gloves affect mining volcanic ash?] No.}}
